name: Pawn Shop
description:
Pawn Shop is a  grid-based old school tactical RPG in roguelike formula with monster-taming genre influence. I was inspired by vibes of Final Fantasy Tactics and Fire Emblem

Control the king of pawns and recruit best befitting team to win over a series of hard, randomized battles, collect items to form ultimate combos for your pawns.

Left Click to confirm, Right click to end turn, right click on icon in deployment mode to display full pawn info, keyboard 1-9 for shortcut activating skills

This is my first 2 months project, I suppose it still has less bugs then CyberPunk  

Game is a bit big, it will take a little time to load in browser, please be patient :)
